abstract: NBA Roundup; San Antonio Spurs beat Atlanta Hawks, 114-95; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Tiago Splitter scored a season-high 23 for the Spurs as San Antonio won its third straight and Atlanta, which leads the Eastern Conference, lost its third straight.

headline.main: Hawks Lose 3rd Straight; Russell Westbrook Sinks Heat
headline.print_headline: Spurs’ Third Straight Win Extends the Hawks’ Skid

snippet: Tiago Splitter scored a season-high 23 for the Spurs as San Antonio won its third straight and Atlanta, which leads the Eastern Conference, lost its third straight.
